title: Salmon fillet with Puy lentils
ingredients: ['200g dried Puy lentils (or any green lentils)', '1 bouquet garni (parsley, bay leaf, thyme)', '4 salmon fillets', 'salt and ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon butter', '1 onion, chopped', '3 carrots, peeled and sliced into thin rounds', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
